description: Samuel is a tall hunk of a man with the sexiest southern accent and big guns he likes to show off. We took him fishing and he felt right at home. “I’m gonna catch a fucken bass…that means ‘big ass’.” He chuckled a bit, revealing his dimples. “Do you like big asses?” He didn’t hesitate, “Oh yeah, as big as they can get! It makes you grin real big!” Big doesn’t even begin to describe Samuel’s ass…it’s pretty much picture-perfect, along with his great cock. He definitely made us grin! What more could you ask for?
title: Samuel
